styles.css: .rx-custom-card { position: relative; background: var(--card-bg, #ffffff); border: var(--card-border, 1px solid #e0e0e0); border-radius: var(--card-border-radius, 12px); padding: 0; box-shadow: var(--card-shadow, 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)); transition: all 0.3s ease; overflow: hidden; } .rx-custom-card:hover { transform: translateY(-4px); box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); } .rx-custom-card .card-header { padding: 16px 20px; border-bottom: 1px solid var(--card-border-color, #e0e0e0); background: var(--card-header-bg, #f8f9fa); } .rx-custom-card .card-title { margin: 0; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; color: var(--card-title-color, #212529); } .rx-custom-card .card-body { padding: var(--card-padding, 20px); color: var(--card-text-color, #495057); line-height: 1.6; } .rx-custom-card .card-footer { padding: 12px 20px; border-top: 1px solid var(--card-border-color, #e0e0e0); background: var(--card-footer-bg, #f8f9fa); font-size: 14px; color: var(--card-footer-color, #6c757d); } .rx-custom-card--elevated { --card-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); } .rx-custom-card--flat { --card-shadow: none; --card-border: 1px solid #dee2e6; } .rx-custom-card--outlined { --card-bg: transparent; --card-border: 2px solid #007bff; --card-shadow: none; }

library.css: .rx-lib .rx-custom-card { display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center; background: var(--card-bg); border: var(--card-border); border-radius: var(--card-border-radius, 12px); padding: var(--card-padding, 16px); color: #ffffff; font-weight: 600; box-shadow: var(--card-shadow); width: var(--preview-width, 180px); height: var(--preview-height, 120px); transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease; cursor: pointer; overflow: hidden; } .rx-lib .rx-custom-card:hover { transform: translateY(-4px) scale(1.03); box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.25); } .rx-lib .rx-custom-card .card-body { text-align: center; }

click.description: Triggered when the card is clicked

hover.description: Triggered when the card is hovered
